sage.scripting

Class DataScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • sage.scripting.DataScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>, IScript
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BehaviorScript

    public class DataScript
extends java.io.File
implements IScript
    This class implements the IScript interface, and it represents a script file that contains only data (i.e. variables).
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • DataScript

        public DataScript(java.lang.String fileName,
                  IScriptManager mgr)
        Creates a new script using the specified script file and script engine.
        Parameters:
        fileName - - The name of the script file (path + name + file extension).
        mgr - - The script manager containing the script engine (interpreter) to be used.
